### Checklist
- [ ] JSON file is valid and placed in `data/apps/`
- [ ] All required fields are present
- [ ] App ID is unique and kebab-case
- [ ] Install command works
- [ ] Repository is public and accessible
- [ ] Icon loads correctly (if provided)
- [ ] Tested locally with `npm run generate-store && npm run dev`
- [ ] Read and followed [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
